resources.string: MoWin let you administrate your Windows Server from wherever you are. Start by click on top left menu icon or slide this screen from left.
Login format is invalid - only alphanumeric characters are allowed
"Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
Login format is invalid - only alphanumeric characters are allowed
Allowed are only alphanumeric characters with space and underscore.
Allowed are only alphanumeric characters and underscore.
Are you sure you want to exit?
Do you really want to logout?
This script will return list of Active Directory users and show if they are enabled or disabled. Green icon is enabled user and gray disabled.
This is overview of system services. You will get all available system services and see if it´s running or not. Green light indicate running service and red stopped one.
Show running processes at host machine. For each process is shown name, percentage of processor load from time when process started, and current ram usage.
This script will return users and computers from Active Directory, which are inactive for at least 30 days.
This is service maintenance part. It allows you to start, stop or restart service according to its actual state.
This is process maintenance part. It allows you to stop the process.
Allowed are only alphanumeric characters with dot, space and underscore. Input also can´t be empty.

This part allows you to create Active Directory user. You can set Name of User, Login and Password. Created user will become enabled when passwords meets server password requirements, otherwise User will be also created, but will became disabled.
Are you sure you want to stop process?
Are you sure you want to stop service?
Are you sure you want to restart service?
Are you sure you want to start service?
By executing this script you will get information about system drives. You will see overall, used and free capacities for all units.
